b8ca84ac99d2cb2bfe43930eb9b178ee010e4812.commitMessage: HADOOP-13467. Shell#getSignalKillCommand should use the bash builtin on Linux. (Arpit Agarwal)

954465e7ba3af3e5b083b6251562e5e77529f906.commitMessage: HADOOP-13434. Add bash quoting to Shell class. (Owen O'Malley)

dfa78484633b3ce21471d527b9c24671e3ca5df9.commitMessage: HADOOP-12478. Shell.getWinUtilsPath() has been renamed Shell.getWinutilsPath(). (stevel)

c59af2fdf8f7f53117c626a895dab7fd78cf08ec.commitMessage: HADOOP-10775. Shell operations to fail with meaningful errors on windows if winutils.exe not found. (stevel)

f1c19b9365cbac88e45a9eed516fbfc6c9aa9947.commitMessage: HADOOP-12441. Fixed shell-kill command behaviour to work correctly on some Linux distributions after HADOOP-12317. Contributed by Wangda Tan.
